member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.SignedInGamerExtensions
member.summary: Provides additional services to Gamer Services for Xbox LIVE.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.SignedInGamerExtensions.BeginAwardAvatarAssets(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.SignedInGamer,System.String[],System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins the asyncronous process of awarding the specified avatar assets to a signed in gamer.
member.param: An AsyncCallback that represents the method called when the operation is complete.
A user-created object used to uniquely identify the request, or null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.SignedInGamerExtensions.EndAwardAvatarAssets(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GamerServices.SignedInGamer,System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Call this function after the system has finished awarding the avatar asset.
member.param: The IAsyncResult used to determine when the asynchronous request is finished.
